mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (wechat_id, owner_id, owner_kind) VALUE (#{wechatId}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerKind})
mapper.select: SELECT balance FROM account WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND owner_kind = #{ownerKind}
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET balance = balance + #{value} WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND owner_kind = #{ownerKind} AND balance + #{value} >= 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM account WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND owner_kind = #{ownerKind}
